Review: Great place to work. Great training and mentors. Easy commute and strong government cyber security presence. Learning is part of the ManTech experience. leadership is always helpful

ManTech is your typical government contractor. The bid on lowest possible acceptable offer so don't expect to get paid nearly what you are worth. Also don't expect any upwards mobility unless new contracts get won. On the bright side they are a larger company and win contract fairly often. That are also an amazing entry point for getting into the tech field right out of school. They will assist with training and they will be more than happy to sponsor you for a clearance which will set you up for bigger and better things. They have been around a while so they know how to play the contractor game. The work may get mundane at times but corporate treats you well even if they under pay you. Even if you leave to somewhere else, once they have a contract to pay you well or promote you their recruiters will follow up to try and bring you back.

review_title: My manager was the worst I have ever had in my 30-year career. All he did was criticize, cut me down verbally and degrade me.
Review: I was not given any indoctrination to my job. No one offered me help or advice when I first started. I had to search and ask for the appropriate documents after being on-site for 2 months. There was no guidebook, instruction, or SOP for my position. I worked for a tyrant of a boss who changed his mind every time a document was reviewed. If you couldn't get into the boss's mind you were screwed.

Terrible, will never work for this company again. Might be different for some people but I will never go back when I leave here. Hope anyone going here does research first they lie and they are un organized
Staff and management are very at tentative to their employees, Company provides a way for employees to grow their career path and professional skills.

Great management team. Team members are always ready to help.
Great place to learn a lot if you are willing to work hard. I love and enjoy what i do everyday.

review_title: Productive fun and challenging place to work.
Review: Great place to work managers are great and company allows employees to bank and make up time within a pay period. Can make up hrs anytime if you need a day off or need to leave early. Pay can benifits are great.
Lack of resources for the project. High turnover rate. it is a revolving door, and unrealistic project assignments, where they wanted to build a program, but there is a lack of resources.
